processing.lib.blinken
Class BlinkenLibrary

java.lang.Object
  processing.core.PImage
      processing.lib.blinken.BlinkenLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable, processing.core.PConstants
public class BlinkenLibrary
extends processing.core.PImage
implements java.lang.Runnable

Blinkenlight processing library by michu / neophob.com 2010 some code is ripped of the animated gif lib by extrapixel.ch
